name: Joint Multi-Domain Ops
description: Preparing space intel teams to plug into JADC2 and coalition targeting.

cards.title: JADC2 Data Thread Mapping
cards.description: Trace how a space sensor cue flows into ABMS, CJADC2, and fires cells so latency and format issues are known. Ref: CJCS JADC2 Strategy 2022.
cards.summaryText: If you can't map the data thread, you can't fix it.

cards.title: Joint Targeting Input
cards.description: Translate space effects into JAAT (Joint Air Attack Team) target folders with desired effect, time-on-target, and risk. Ref: JP 3-60.
cards.summaryText: Make space effects readable to every targeting board.

cards.title: Space Support Requests
cards.description: Rehearse how air/land components submit and track SSRs, ensuring fulfillment or reattack recommendations. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: SSR discipline keeps expectations aligned across the joint team.

cards.title: Joint Space Tasking Order Read-In
cards.description: Break down JSTO sections, coordination measures, and net synchronization before daily JTCB. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Space pros must fluently brief JSTO relevance to non-space leaders.

cards.title: Coalition Release Matrix
cards.description: Review releasability rules for partners (Five Eyes, NATO) and tag products accordingly. Ref: AFTTP 3-1.Space.
cards.summaryText: Share boldly, but always inside classification guardrails.

cards.title: Multi-Domain Effects Matrix
cards.description: Link space actions to cyber, air, land, and maritime effects for the commander’s decision matrix. Ref: JP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: Show commanders how a space move ripples across the fight.

cards.title: Cross-Component Intelligence Cueing
cards.description: Plan how intel from other domains triggers SDA collection and vice versa. Ref: AFDP 2-0.
cards.summaryText: Cueing should feel automatic between components.

cards.title: Joint COP Update
cards.description: Practice updating the Joint Common Operating Picture with space tracks, effects, and constraints in plain language. Ref: JP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: If the COP is wrong, the fight is wrong—feed it reliable space data.

cards.title: Operational Assessment Cues
cards.description: Define Measures of Performance/Effectiveness for space contributions to joint objectives. Ref: CJCSI 3162.02D.
cards.summaryText: Space Guardians must prove effects with measurable data.

cards.title: Battle Damage Assessment Template
cards.description: Provide BDA for space-enabled effects with accuracy, timeliness, and follow-on recommendations. Ref: JP 3-60.
cards.summaryText: BDA closes the loop; space intel must deliver it like any other domain.

cards.title: Dynamic Targeting Inject
cards.description: Walk through F2T2EA (find, fix, track, target, engage, assess) with a space-enabled target. Ref: JP 3-60.
cards.summaryText: Space elements must be fluent in dynamic targeting lexicon.

cards.title: Joint Planning Group Integration
cards.description: Prepare inputs for the JPG: assumptions, facts, limitations, and space unique considerations. Ref: JP 5-0.
cards.summaryText: Be the Guardian who speaks joint planning fluently.
